elements.name: Verify API: getGeographyCount API return Total Geography Count

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "getGeographyCount"
User calls "getGeographyCount" API with "Get" http Request
Verify geography_Count result is greater than 0
The API call is success with StatusCode 200

elements.name: Verify API: createGeography API add Geography payload

steps.name: "System_Admin" User "Add" Geography Payload
User calls "createGeography" API with "Post" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return Geography instance
Verify Total geography_Count increased by 1

elements.name: Verify API: createGeography API with no geography Body

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "createGeography"
User calls "createGeography" API with "Post" http Request
The API call is failed with StatusCode 400

"message" in response body is "Required request body is missing: public com.ibm.dc.geo.entity.Geography com.ibm.dc.geo.controller.GeographyController.createGeography(java.lang.String,com.ibm.dc.geo.entity.Geography)"

arguments.val: "Required request body is missing: public com.ibm.dc.geo.entity.Geography com.ibm.dc.geo.controller.GeographyController.createGeography(java.lang.String,com.ibm.dc.geo.entity.Geography)"

elements.name: Verify API: getAllGeographies API return List of All Geographies

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "getAllGeographies"
User calls "getAllGeographies" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Geographies
Total number of Geography in List is equal to getGeographyCount
Geography added exist in returned Geography List

elements.name: Verify API: getGeographyBySearchCriteria API, search no SearchCriteria

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "getGeographyBySearchCriteria"
User calls "getGeographyBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Geographies
Response should be list all Geographies=getAllGeographies

elements.name: Verify API: getGeographyBySearchCriteria API, search by 'geographyId'

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke getGeographyBySearchCriteria with Parameter: "geographyId"
User calls "getGeographyBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Geographies
Response should be list of Geographies and size should be one
Geography added exist in returned Geography List

elements.name: Verify API: getGeographyBySearchCriteria API, search by 'geographyName'

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke getGeographyBySearchCriteria with Parameter: "geographyName"
User calls "getGeographyBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Geographies
Geography added exist in returned Geography List

elements.name: Verify API: getGeographyBySearchCriteria API, search by 'geographyId' & 'geographyName'

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke getGeographyBySearchCriteria with Parameter: 'geographyId' & 'geographyName'
User calls "getGeographyBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Geographies
Response should be list of Geographies and size should be one
Geography added exist in returned Geography List

elements.name: Verify API: getGeographyBySearchCriteria API, search by invalid 'geographyId'

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "getGeographyBySearchCriteria" with invalid Parameter: "geographyId" = "-9"
User calls "getGeographyBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Geographies with zero records

elements.name: Verify API: getGeographyBySearchCriteria API, search by invalid 'geographyName'

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "getGeographyBySearchCriteria" with invalid Parameter: "geographyName" = "invalidGeographyName"
User calls "getGeographyBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Geographies with zero records

elements.name: Verify API: deleteGeography update Geography status as Passive

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke deleteGeography with Parameter: "geographyId"
User calls "deleteGeography" API with "Delete" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify GeographyStatus of particular Geography updated as Passive

elements.name: Verify API: deleteGeography API,  with invalid geographyId

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "deleteGeography" with invalid Parameter: "geographyId" = "-9"
User calls "deleteGeography" API with "Delete" http Request
The API call is failed with StatusCode 500
"message" in response body is "Geography with id - -9 not found"

elements.name: Verify API: deleteGeography API, with no Param

steps.name: "System_Admin" User "deleteGeography" with no Param
User calls "deleteGeography" API with "Delete" http Request
The API call is failed with StatusCode 400
"message" in response body is "Required Integer parameter 'geographyId' is not present"

elements.name: Verify API: updateGeography API add Geography paylod

steps.name: "System_Admin" User "Update" Geography Payload
User calls "updateGeography" API with "Put" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify Geography fields gets updated

elements.name: Verify API: updateGeography API, with no geography Body

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "getGeographyCount"
User calls "updateGeography" API with "Put" http Request
The API call is failed with StatusCode 400

"message" in response body is "Required request body is missing: public com.ibm.dc.geo.entity.Geography com.ibm.dc.geo.controller.GeographyController.updateGeography(java.lang.String,com.ibm.dc.geo.entity.Geography)"

arguments.val: "Required request body is missing: public com.ibm.dc.geo.entity.Geography com.ibm.dc.geo.controller.GeographyController.updateGeography(java.lang.String,com.ibm.dc.geo.entity.Geography)"
